result.eng: We will have to pay the funeral costs.

result.eng: The accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.

result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.

result.eng: They offered him to pay his travel costs.

result.eng: The tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
